sentences.sContent: So that satisfies the definition of validity.
sentences.sContent_eng: So that satisfies the definition of validity.
sentences.sCn: 所以这满足了有效性的定义。

sentences.sContent: Does this argument satisfy the definition of validity or does it not?
sentences.sContent_eng: Does this argument satisfy the definition of validity or does it not?
sentences.sCn: 这个论点满足有效性的定义吗？,还是不满足？

sentences.sContent: While each of these might have some validity, in many cases the same general comments may also apply to many of the other projects you work on.
sentences.sContent_eng: While each of these might have some validity, in many cases the same general comments may also apply to many of the other projects you work on.
sentences.sCn: 尽管其中每个问题可能具有某些正确性，但是在许多情况下，一般性评论还可能适用于您从事的其他项目。

sentences.sContent: ...but they are also denied valuable feedback as to the validity and acceptability of their inner thoughts and feelings...

phrases.pCn: 内容效度；内容有效性，内容正确性
外在效度，外部效度；外部有效性；外部真实性

words.tran: 有效的，有根据的；正当的
确认（validate的过去式及过去分词形式）；使生效
